comment: You can really tell he has a passion for the material. He gives phenomenal real-world examples that can relate to anybody. His "romance novel" assignment was simple yet gave his students a way to apply the material to their life. In my opinion, this is the way every teacher should be.

Dr. Thunder is the best professor I've had at this University hands down. He's hilarious and knows how to relate the topics to his students to make things entertaining. You must pay attention in class and take notes to do well on the papers, but I would highly recommend him to anyone. Don't buy the text, you won't need it. Attendance is mandatory.
Dr. Toepfer is awesome!! I was dreading com theory but he makes it really interesting. He is really laid back and helpful. He truly cares about his students. I would highly recommend him!!

Prof. Toepfer is one of the most intriguing professors I've had so far. I usually dread night classes but he definitely kept topics and discussions very interesting. I wouldn't say it was an easy class but he definitely gives everyone a chance to challenge themselves through the course work he provides. Definitely worth taking!
Mr. Toepfer is awesome! Don't take this class if you want to be lazy. Extremely helpful and understanding. Really knows his stuff!

Mr. Topefer is a good guy. I had him for com 1109. His lectures get a little boring to me, he goes off on tangents quite a bit. However, he does relate the topics back to something we can understand and relate to. He's a lot of fun and really helpful if you need him. I'd definitely recommend taking him!
Professor Toepfer is AWESOME! He is funny and really relates the lectures to you the student. Attendance is required and he has 3 tests and 2 group projects (I'm in Com 1109). If you can, take him.

Comm Theory class. Teaching style is more relatable to students, letting us pick tv shows/music and then relate it to a theory. All exams are essay style. One group presentation based off a tv show of your choice. Assigns outside readings but I never read and made a B. Very funny, would take again. Lots of class discussion though.
Very nice person. Passionate about communication. Extremely politically correct, but encourages student discussion.
such a nice guy, and he makes the class very easy! he is very helpful! take him if at all possible!
Great teacher. He is a really funny guy and is always willing to help students.

Attendence not mandatory, but you get penalized for not showing up. Class really not for older crowd moreso for the new college students. Only midterm and final exams but a lot of memorization and projects for this to be an elective class. Not worth the time, but maybe worth the credit hours.

Shane is an awesome teacher! He makes sure his class understands the topic prior to going on. Very concerned with students asking if anyone has concerns about ANYTHING prior to class beginning. He is VERY cool!!!!

Shane is an amazing teacher and my favorite from my first semester in college. He is extremely understanding and always willing to help. He is so cool you would want to hang out with him outside class. TAKE THIS PROFESSOR!

Shane was a really good teacher and since he was teaching the freshman seminar, he was extremely helpful. He was open to questions we had about other classes and he had good advice. He is really nice and really funny!
